timeline.message:
Created abstract class to handle a bridge between an OpenMrsObject and is position in the form.

Extended conditions and obs from this new class.

updated liquibase-update-to-latest-2.4.x.xml to add the new column form_namespace_path to the table conditions.
Fix comment on changeSet to add the column form_namespace_path to the table conditions.
Added updated test saveCondition_shouldSaveNewCondition to test condition.getFormNamespaceAndPath.
Added updated test saveCondition_shouldSaveNewCondition to test condition.getFormNamespaceAndPath.
Change exception message to refer `BaseFormRecordableOpenmrsDatainsted` of `obs`.
Renamed form_namespace_path to form_namespace_and_path to be consistent with Obs old value.

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/icrc-loliveira/openmrs-core into TRUNK-5862

 Conflicts:
	api/src/main/java/org/openmrs/Obs.java
	api/src/test/java/org/openmrs/api/impl/ConditionServiceImplTest.java
Add a new test `saveCondition_shouldSaveNewCondition` instead of touching the existing one.
Replace dummy class BaseFormRecordableOpenmrsDataImpl by Obs
Replaced the import org.junit.Assert (JUnit 4) assertions in the BaseFormRecordableOpenmrsDataTest to use JUnit 5. JUnit 5 ones that are in the Jupiter package

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/openmrs/openmrs-core into TRUNK-5862

 Conflicts:
	api/src/main/java/org/openmrs/BaseFormRecordableOpenmrsData.java
	api/src/test/java/org/openmrs/BaseFormRecordableOpenmrsDataTest.java

timeline.bodyText: we generally favor static imports of assertion methods over the use of Assertions.yyy but other than that it looks good from JUnit 5 side 👍
timeline.author: teleivo

replies.author: mks-d
